entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
